Contact Sellstate Vision Realty | Punta Gorda & Lakewood, FL | Get in Touch with Us Skip to main content Close Search Menu Home Business Plan Sphere of Influence Schedule Appointment About Us Revenue Sharing Referral Program Licensing Process Contact Us Contact Us Punta Gorda 2705 Tamiami Trail, Unit 313 Punta Gorda, FL 33950 Office – 941-336-5400 Lakewood 9188 Town Center Pkwy Unit 101 Lakewood Ranch, Fl 34202 Savannah Sheppard Broker/ Owner Cell – 941-807-4304 Direct – 941-807-4304 Email – savannah@joinvisionrealty.com What Are Our Agents Saying About Us “ “ From the moment I walked through the door, I knew this would be my Real Estate home! I had worked in the business for 16 years in SC, and never had that feeling! This is a company that prides itself on Agent Training, a real community, and most importantly making you feel like family! Amazing Broker, and support staff - come aboard - you will love it! :) ” Beth LeClaire Realtor “ “ When you make the decision to join Sellstate Vision Realty you are not only joining a brokerage, you are joining a family. Never in my wildest dreams would I have thought that a business could provide this much support not only in my professional life but also in my personal life. By Joining Sellstate Vision Realty you better be prepared to grow. They provide an unlimited amount of education and opportunity. Being provided with weekly training sessions provides me the tools to constantly grow, we collaborate on weekly meetings and we have fun while doing so. Sellstate Vision Realty are my co-workers, friends, family, and biggest cheerleaders in real estate and life. ” Jeorgia Sutton Realtor “ “ I've had the privilege of working with Sellstate Vision Really for several months but even during my short time here, I can honestly say Vision Realty stands out in more ways than one. First and foremost, the support and mentorship I've received here have been invaluable to my career. The experienced team of agents and brokers at SVR welcomed me with open arms and provided me with the guidance I needed to excel in this competitive industry. Their willingness to share their knowledge, insights, and strategies has been instrumental in my professional growth. In addition to the supportive atmosphere, SVR offers cutting-edge tools and technology that empower me to serve my clients better. From advanced CRM systems to in-house marketing resources, I've had access to everything necessary to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving real estate market. What truly sets SVR apart, though, is the culture! SVR’s atmosphere is one of collaboration and camaraderie. Despite the competitive nature of our industry, I've found that my colleagues are always willing to lend a helping hand or share their expertise when needed. It's a true team effort, and I genuinely look forward to coming to work every day. I can confidently say that my journey with SVR has been nothing short of exceptional. I've found the support, resources, and innovation I was seeking to thrive in this industry. If you're considering a career in real estate or are looking for a brokerage that truly cares about your success, I wholeheartedly recommend Sellstate Vision Realty! It's been a game-changer for me, and I'm excited about the bright future it continues to offer. ” Courtney Jones Realtor Unlock Your Potential with Free Training Tips: Elevate Your Skills, Without Breaking the Bank! David Moerschel biography: 13 things about US Capitol riot suspect from Punta Gorda, Florida – CONAN Daily Skip to content Search for: CONAN Daily Menu Home About CONAN Daily Contact CONAN Daily NEWS Entertainment Lifestyle Business LISTS Beautiful People Biographical Data Contest Results July 6, 2021 December 26, 2023 Abdel Jibri Omar law & money , North America , politicians , United States David Moerschel biography: 13 things about US Capitol riot suspect from Punta Gorda, Florida Advertisements David Jonathan Moerschel is an American man from Florida, United States. Here are 13 more things about him: He lives in Punta Gorda, Charlotte County, Florida . Aside from Punta Gorda, he has lived in other parts of Florida including Lake Mary. He has lived in different parts of Georgia, USA including Kennesaw and Woodstock. He previously lived in Cary, North Carolina, USA, in Beaumont, Texas, USA, in Maryville, Tennessee, USA and in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. He is a member of the Oath Keepers . He is a Republican. On August 26, 2014, he registered to vote in Seminole County, Florida . On September 7, 2019, he participated in the Remember The Fallen 5K 10K 2019 memorial run in North Port, Sarasota County, Florida and ranked eighth. From January 5-7, 2021, he and other individuals stored firearms at the Comfort Inn Ballston in Arlington, Virginia, USA. Wearing a long sleeve black jacket and backwards green baseball cap with an Oath Keepers insignia, he went to the U.S. Capitol building in Washington, D.C., USA on January 6, 2021. That day, Donald Trump supporters breached the building while a joint session of Congress was certifying the vote of the Electoral College and affirming Joe Biden ‘s victory in the 2020 presidential election. In May 2021, Federal Bureau of Investigation agents met him in person. On June 14, 2021, FBI agents recovered from his attorney a black flak vest that appears to be consistent with the one he wore at the U.S. Capitol on January 6, 2021 and black jacket and a black duffel-type bag that appears to be consistent with the ones he wore or carried in the Comfort Inn Ballston on January 7, 2021. An FBI agent filed a criminal complaint against him, which was signed by U.S. Magistrate Judge Robin M. Meriweather on July 1, 2021. He was 43 years old when he was arrested on July 6, 2021. For his participation in the U.S. Capitol riot on January 6, 2021, he was charged with obstruction of Justice/Congress and unlawful entry into restricted buildings or grounds. (This is a developing story. More details are being added.) Advertisements #CapitolRiot : The DOJ has now charged a 17th alleged #OathKeeper in a purported conspiracy to disrupt Congress on January 6. David Moerschel, of Florida, is charged with conspiracy, obstruction of Congress and unlawful entry into a restricted building. @wusa9 @EricFlackTV pic.twitter.com/WftS8MfbEQ — Jordan Fischer (@JordanOnRecord) July 6, 2021 Advertisements If you have information about someone who participated in the U.S. Capitol riot on January 6, 2021, call 1-800-CALL-FBI. You may also submit relevant photos and videos to the FBI .
